EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud is the essential backbone of healthcare digitization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Healthcare needs cloud for digital transformation Digital technology is advancing, while healthcare struggles with rising costs, competition, and patient loyalty. Digital transformation is necessary, but cannot happen without cloud technologies.
As you build your cloud infrastructure it is crucial to transition your network. A strategically networked cloud infrastructure can seamlessly interconnect hundreds of sites, thousands of devices and multiple data silos to streamline workflow and provide anywhere, anytime access to data and knowledge that are crucial for improving patient care.
To learn more watch Healthcare needs cloud for its digital transformation. <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=caJu6XbVVKo]]> Sincerely,
Cindy Bergevin Head of Healthcare Marketing, Nokia Email: cindy.bergevin@nokia.com <[[mailto:cindy.bergevin@nokia.com]]>
